Rule.Name: Thread-bound member is called from an unknown thread
Rule.Resolution: Bind caller to thread {1}. Member {0} is currently bound to thread {1}. Caller {2} is currently unbound.

Rule.Name: Thread-bound member is called from the wrong thread
Rule.Resolution: Rebind member to thread {3} or caller to thread {1}. Member {0} is currently bound to thread {1}. Caller {2} is currently bound to thread {3}.

Rule.Name: Member override must not attempt to re-define thread bindings
Rule.Resolution: Member {0} must not be bound to thread {1} because other rules will use bindings from {2}.
